mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.agent_id AS "agentId", a.money AS "money", a.trade_time AS "tradeTime", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.trade_type AS "tradeType", a.trade_status AS "tradeStatus", a.operate_by AS "operateBy"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent_fund_detail( id, agent_id, money, trade_time, img_url, trade_type, trade_status, operate_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{agentId}, #{money}, #{tradeTime}, #{imgUrl}, #{tradeType}, #{tradeStatus}, #{operateBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE agent_fund_detail SET agent_id = #{agentId}, money = #{money}, trade_time = #{tradeTime}, img_url = #{imgUrl}, trade_type = #{tradeType}, trade_status = #{tradeStatus}, operate_by = #{operateBy} WHERE id = #{id}
